title: MOVA Skill Descriptor v1
description: Shared schema describing a MOVA skill in the Skills Lab.

description.description: Human-readable description of what the skill does.

mova_core_version.description: Version of the MOVA core this skill is compatible with.

uses_ds.description: List of ds.* schemas this skill relies on.

uses_env.description: List of env.* envelopes this skill relies on.

tags.description: Optional free-form tags for search and grouping.

state.description: Lifecycle state of the skill (from the global states vocabulary).

resources.description: List of main resource types this skill operates on (from the global resources vocabulary).

verbs.description: List of verbs this skill primarily uses (from the global verbs vocabulary).

created_at.description: When this skill descriptor was first created.

updated_at.description: When this skill descriptor was last updated.

episode_policy.description: Episode recording policy for this skill.
